header: Excel Web - Shortcut key for current date
idea_text: Shortcut ctrl + ; to insert current date is not available in excel web. Please try to add this feature in excel web as well. Existing articles contain the steps to do so, but those are not up to the mark and that still require to remember current date.

header: Please activate it for Enterprise plans as well
idea_text: All our clients are below 100 employees, yet most of them are on Please activate it for Enterprise plans as wellOffice365 Plan E3, including us selves, and we are only 5 on the team.All the new goodies, Connections, Listings, Invoicing, MileIQ and Bookings, Outlook Customer Manager are only for Business Premium, why not let the companies that pay more opt-in on these as well?

comments.text: Yes. And, bring MileIQ to Europe!
Agreed.  Not having this available in E3 doesn't make any sense.  Our users are paying significantly more - why has Microsoft chosen not to offer this to the more expensive tier (E3).
Hi Ulrich, thanks for the feedback. We’ll take a look at whether we can add these products to the enterprise plans.

idea_text: Can you optimize the Listings app for the iPad Pro? Would like to use it but not on a small device like the iPhone. Would get a lot more use of the app on the iPad.

reaction.note:
Hi Matthew,We’d like to understand what you mean by making the Listings app work for the iPad Pro? Microsoft Listings is currently available on the web only through Office 365 Business center, do you find the mobile web display to not work well on your iPad Pro?Thank you, 
Office 365 Business center team

comments.text: You have an app for the iPhone for Listing but does not look good on iPad Pro. This is the same for the Connections, Invoicing, Staffhub and Bookings. I would like to use these apps for my business but they are only available for iPhone. Make for iPad and I would use a lot more for the business.
update google chrome

idea_text: I mean everyone has their own way of thinking about how each ideas, collaboration between office 365 and office business premium, can we just try to combine them together to create a new way of improvements on any globally connected, is that possible?

reaction.note: Hi John,Thank you for your feedback, we’re interested in understanding more on which scenarios or apps are you suggesting to combine and if any of them are specifically related to the small business focused Business center?

comments.text: the cloud infrastructure is amazing, innovations are the future

header: Add some way to create your own custom transition, animation in PowerPoint
idea_text: I'm looking for some way to create our custom transition, animation instead of default stuffs in PowerPoint, I think if it realease, we can create and upload, download cool animation, Transition from some designers. Because default stuffs can cause boring, I want to make my own one!

My customer has office hours by appointment only on the weekends. I have noway to indicate this. I have to show the weekend hours as closed. It would be awesome if I could show weekend hours as appointment only and link to Bookings for scheduling.

reaction.note: Hi Marando,Your suggestion does sound very interesting but unfortunately the feature you are requesting is not available for the providers we partner with. If anything changes with the providers we will review your suggestion. Thank you!

comments.text: Awesome blog thanks for sharing this

Hi Marando, Your suggestion does sound very interesting but unfortunately the feature you are requesting is not available for the providers we partner with. If anything changes with the providers we will review your suggestion. Thank you!
